bibl.title: Territory of Washington v. Thomas P. Overnals. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Mistad Liaser of Ameica Territory of Washington County of Jefferson
To the sheriff of the County of Jefferson W.T.

Greetings: In the name of the United States you are herby commanded to ___ T. Nelson Overnals, a ___ child about fourteen months old, if he be found in your coustody, who is said to be in the custody of one Thomas P. Overnals of said County and to bring said child for the writ_ before then CC. 14 months, district Judge at Clumbus, in Port Townsend W. T. to the end that ___ May be made into into the mater amd cause of fail alleged _____ ov if in . your opinion A should seem improper to bring said child_ to said place, on account of _____ age, there to detain him him ___ to his mother in said county, who is not wife of said Thomas P. Overnals, There to remain with _____
in the premises. and of this warant_ make_________
Witness the ___ CC 24 sworn_ 22, judges of the district court of the 3d jud. District W.T. A Port Townsend W.T. this 28th day of Oct. 1862, and the year of the dictrict court of Port Townsend.
